mapper.select: /*getDeptBList*/ SELECT IF(A.DEPT_NAME = '경영지원실', 999999, A.DEPT_SEQ) AS dept_seq, CASE WHEN A.DEPT_NAME = '경영지원실' THEN '공통운영비' ELSE IF(A.DEPT_LEVEL = 1, CONCAT(A.DEPT_NAME,'장'), A.DEPT_NAME) END AS dept_name, IF(A.DEPT_LEVEL = 1, A.DEPT_SEQ, B.DEPT_SEQ) AS parent_dept_seq, IF(A.DEPT_LEVEL = 1, A.DEPT_NAME, B.DEPT_NAME) AS parent_dept_name, A.path_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY parent_dept_seq order by parent_dept_seq, B.dept_level desc, B.ORDER_SN, A.ORDER_SN) AS row_num, COUNT(*)OVER(PARTITION BY parent_dept_seq DESC) AS row_cnt FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO B ON B.DEPT_SEQ = A.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY parent_dept_seq, B.dept_level desc, B.order_sn, A.order_sn
